description: Dive into "Chennai's Enchanted Castles: A Journey Through Time" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Chennai's Enchanted Castles: A Journey Through Time

places.generalDescription: Noor Pearl is a well-known residential project located near Silver Castle. It is surrounded by other popular developments such as Tower Of Adyar, Alda Amogh, TVH Quadrant, and Bhaggyam Cricket Villa. This prime location offers residents access to various amenities and a vibrant neighborhood.

sources.snippet: Tower Of Adyar, Alda Amogh, TVH Quadrant, ARC Noor Pearl and Bhaggyam Cricket Villa are other popular residential projects near Silver Castle.

places.name: Noor Pearl
places.address: Old no:3, New no:5, Second Avenue, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Shastri Nagar, Adyar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600020, India

places.generalDescription: Nestled along the serene banks of the Adyar River, Thendral, also known as Brodie Castle, stands as one of Chennai's oldest garden houses. This historical gem was established in 1796 when James Brodie, a civil servant and member of the Scottish Brodie clan, received an expansive 11-acre plot from the East India Company.

sources.snippet: One of the oldest garden houses in the city, Brodie Castle or Thendral is situated on 11 acres granted by the East India Company to James Brodie, a civil servant. “In 1796, the company gave him the land on the north bank of the Adyar river on which he quickly built a large house,” says V Narayan Swami, finance director for a group of power companies which researches British history and art in India. “Brodie, who was part of the Scottish Brodie clan, built himself a castle in Chennai, a grand, classical house with a Scottish touch in the form of two castellated turrets.
sources.shortName: Notes from Brodie Castle | Chennai News

places.name: Thendral
places.address: 33, 3rd St, VGP Layout, Karthik Nagar, VGP lay out, Injambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600115, India

places.generalDescription: KALPANA K, a conservation architect, notes that like many garden houses in Chennai located near the river, Brodie Castle also has its entry directly to the upper floor. This is a common feature among buildings near the river in Chennai, such as Madras Club, where raised plinths are prevalent.

sources.snippet: Like all the garden houses in Chennai that are near the river, the entry to Brodie Castle is directly to the upper floor,” says conservation architect K Kalpana, who was part of the committee. “Most buildings near the river — Madras Club for instance — have this unique feature. They all have raised plinths.
sources.shortName: Notes from Brodie Castle | Chennai News

places.name: KALPANA K
places.address: 25, Varadharaja Perumal Kovil Street, Sanjeevarayanpet, Tondiarpet, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600083, India
